segments.text: I find myself thinking about the small moments we take for granted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the woman polishes that plate, so absorbed in her task, is something I admire.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s also a hint of frustration because she ignores the disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t even looked down at the overflowing sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are taking a big risk, and it seems no one in the room cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their joyful anticipation for cookies clashes so much with the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn’t she take a moment to glance at what’s happening around her?
segments.speaker: PAR
